top_candidates.title: [HW] Make `hw::getBitWidth` use std::optional vs -1
top_candidates.reasoning: Directly addresses getBitWidth returning -1 for unsupported types, which is the root cause of the reported crash

top_candidates.title: [circt-opt] Segmentation fault during XOR op building

duplicates.notes: While a very similar issue exists (9287) that addresses getBitWidth returning -1, the specific scenario with LLHD Mem2Reg pass and real type variables in clocked assignments does not appear to be explicitly reported. The crash is unique because: 1) It occurs specifically in Mem2Reg pass insertBlockArgs, 2) It involves real types with clocked assignments, 3) The -1 bitwidth propagates through hw::getBitWidth. Issue 9287 may address the root cause but should review this specific manifestation.
